question: [File: volo-vault/sources/utils.move] [Function: clone_vecmap_table()] [Iteration Direction] Does backward iteration (i-- from length) have semantic meaning, or is it arbitrary? (Low)
[File: volo-vault/sources/utils.move] [Function: div_d()] [Zero Check] Does div_d() check for v2=0 before dividing, or can it panic on zero denominator? (Critical)
[File: volo-vault/sources/utils.move] [Function: div_with_oracle_price()] [Zero Price] Does div_with_oracle_price() validate v2 > 0, or can zero price cause panic? (Critical)
[File: volo-vault/sources/utils.move] [Function: mul_d()] [Overflow Check] Does mul_d() check for overflow before computing v1*v2, or can it silently wrap? (Critical)
[File: volo-vault/sources/utils.move] [Function: mul_with_oracle_price()] [Overflow Validation] Does mul_with_oracle_price() prevent v1*v2 overflow, or rely on panic? (High)
[File: volo-vault/sources/utils.move] [Function: to_oracle_price_decimals()] [Overflow Guard] Does to_oracle_price_decimals() check v*1e18 won't overflow before multiplying? (High)
[File: volo-vault/sources/utils.move] [Function: to_decimals()] [Input Validation] Does to_decimals() validate v < 2^247 to prevent overflow? (High)
[File: volo-vault/sources/utils.move] [Function: clone_vecmap_table()] [Empty Check] Does clone_vecmap_table() handle empty VecMap correctly, or create invalid table? (Low)
[File: volo-vault/sources/utils.move] [Function: parse_key()] [String Length] Does parse_key() limit output string length to prevent storage bloat or parsing DoS? (Low)
[File: volo-vault/sources/utils.move] [Function: mul_d() chain] [Chained Operations] Can mul_d(mul_d(x, y), z) accumulate rounding errors differently than mul_d(x, mul_d(y, z))? (Medium)
[File: volo-vault/sources/utils.move] [Function: div_d() chain] [Division Chain] Does div_d(div_d(x, y), z) = div_d(x, mul_d(y, z)), or can ordering create exploitable differences? (High)
[File: volo-vault/sources/utils.move] [Function: Mixed Decimals] [Decimal Mixing] Can code mix to_decimals() and to_oracle_price_decimals() outputs, creating 1e9 factor errors? (Critical)
[File: volo-vault/sources/utils.move] [Function: Oracle + Vault Math] [Cross-System] Can mul_d(mul_with_oracle_price(balance, price), share_price) introduce double rounding errors? (High)
[File: volo-vault/sources/utils.move] [Function: clone_vecmap_table()] [Storage Corruption] Can clone_vecmap_table() create table in different storage than source, breaking access patterns? (Medium)
[File: volo-vault/sources/utils.move] [Function: parse_key()] [Key Stability] Can parse_key() output change between calls with same inputs due to type_name changes across upgrades? (High)
[File: volo-vault/sources/utils.move] [Constants] [Upgrade Safety] Can module upgrade change DECIMALS or ORACLE_DECIMALS, breaking compatibility with existing vault state? (Critical)
[File: volo-vault/sources/utils.move] [Function: mul_d()] [Rounding Direction] Does mul_d() always round down, and can attacker profit by exploiting consistent rounding direction? (High)
[File: volo-vault/sources/utils.move] [Function: div_d()] [Dust Profit] Can attacker repeatedly deposit/withdraw to collect rounding dust, profiting from truncation errors? (Medium)
[File: volo-vault/sources/utils.move] [Function: mul_with_oracle_price()] [Price Timing] Can attacker time operations to exploit specific oracle price values that maximize rounding errors? (High)
[File: volo-vault/sources/utils.move] [Function: from_decimals()] [Truncation Profit] Can attacker craft withdrawal amounts that maximize truncation, stealing dust from other users? (Medium)
[File: volo-vault/sources/utils.move] [Function: mul_d() + div_d()] [Invariant: Reversibility] Can div_d(mul_d(shares, price), price) < shares, violating share preservation invariant? (Critical)
[File: volo-vault/sources/utils.move] [Function: to_decimals() + from_decimals()] [Invariant: Identity] Can from_decimals(to_decimals(amount)) lose precision, breaking deposit/withdraw parity? (High)

[File: volo-vault/sources/utils.move] [Function: mul_with_oracle_price() + div_with_oracle_price()] [Invariant: USD Balance] Can round-trip conversion change USD value, breaking total_usd_value invariant? (Critical)
[File: volo-vault/sources/utils.move] [Function: clone_vecmap_table()] [Invariant: Key Preservation] Can clone lose or duplicate keys, breaking asset custody tracking? (Critical)
[File: volo-vault/sources/utils.move] [Function: mul_d()] [Exact DECIMALS] Can mul_d(DECIMALS, DECIMALS) overflow or produce unexpected result? (Medium)
